Requesting Lock

Update

V.02

Added Bulboa - A scorched wreck of a planet.

Started work on Valdnes - My first gas giant. Should be released tomorrow.

Edited January 25, 2014 by Poryy
This planet creator Krag made is really turning into something wonderful. Great job I'm loving this set of planets. They look very natural.

Looks really good. Is there a way I can get the planets of abbadon to orbit kerbol? No offence its just i don't really like a star orbiting kerbol.

Edited January 25, 2014 by montyben101
how far is the star from kerbol?

It looks cool but i'm not a big fan of the white symmetrical crater streaks dotted across the planets, some of you may disagree but its just my personal preferance.

Anyways the textures look great, but a tad blurry. Did you get them from space engine?

It looks cool but i'm not a big fan of the white symmetrical crater streaks dotted across the planets, some of you may disagree but its just my personal preferance.

Anyways the textures look great, but a tad blurry. Did you get them from space engine?

Yes I did. I would have made them 4056, but I care about performance.

how far is the star from kerbol?

620,000,000,000 distance units

This planet creator Krag made is really turning into something wonderful. Great job I'm loving this set of planets. They look very natural.

Thanks!

Looks really good. Is there a way I can get the planets of abbadon to orbit kerbol? No offence its just i don't really like a star orbiting kerbol.

I honestly don't know. I'm planning on adding many more planerts anyway. It's impossible to make the star orbit anything else, you see.

Wait what? That's me!

Anyway, I'm downloading this pack, it will probably go well with KSPI warp drive

Wait what? That's me!

Anyway, I'm downloading this pack, it will probably go well with KSPI warp drive

Indeed it will. Warning, in an hour you may need to redownload! I am making an ocean moon for valnes!

EDIT: Nevermind. Little bugger just doesn't want to have a shallow enough ocean!

Edited January 25, 2014 by Poryy

I'm happy you added a new star. sucks that it has to orbit Kerbol but that's what we're stuck with.

I don't like all the mods that add crazy numbers of planets to the system, good to make a second star.

Why no pictures of the star?

I'm happy you added a new star. sucks that it has to orbit Kerbol but that's what we're stuck with.

I don't like all the mods that add crazy numbers of planets to the system, good to make a second star.

Why no pictures of the star?

Because it looks exactly the same as Kerbol. It's impossible to retexture it.
I meant is there a way to get the planets of abbadon orbit kerbol, not abbadon orbit jool or something.

I meant is there a way to get the planets of abbadon orbit kerbol, not abbadon orbit jool or something.

I don't know. You can try if you want, but I won't guarantee it works.

V.03

Added 4 moons of Valdnes:

Corvus, Molgon, Talon, and Kethos!
Can't download it, because of a 403 Error Dropbox. Maybe you put it on for members only(if you can do that.)?

Can't download it, because of a 403 Error Dropbox. Maybe you put it on for members only(if you can do that.)?

Dropbox may be down. When I get home I will restore the old download link.
Fantastic! I might have to play around with this when it is a bit more mature. As it stands I'm already right up against RAM crashes

Fantastic! I might have to play around with this when it is a bit more mature. As it stands I'm already right up against RAM crashes

I'm planning on adding a whole bunch more stuff.

My idea list:

Second gas giant in the Abaddon system

Re-writing this as a bunch of separate planet packs, like the Verviedi Planet Pack, the Enhanced Kerbol Planet Pack, the Sol Planet Pack, ect...

Definitely a Kerbin-Like planet in the Abaddon system.

Dropbox may be down. When I get home I will restore the old download link.

Still can't download, so Dropbox could be down. I'll try tomorrow.

Still can't download, so Dropbox could be down. I'll try tomorrow.

I fixed the download. Enjoy!

V.04

Fixed texture bugs on Corvus and Molgon
Currently waiting on Planetfactory CE update so I can give Valdnes a dark blue atmosphere.
I am now taking suggestions. Please reply to this thread with your suggestions for new planets and moons.

Update 1/27/14:

Sol Planet Pack is now in closed Beta.

Kerbol+ is being worked on.

Fixed weird texture bug on Corvus and Talon... Again.
